title: Sarmaşık Zamanı
overview: Ezgi is a young woman who is happily married and has a good job. His life takes a different turn when a stranger tells him. Ezgi, who begins to question everything she believes in, begins to seek answers to the questions that plague her mind. What is her husband Kerem really like? Is her marriage as good as it seems or is it about to end? Unsure whether to believe what she sees or hears or what she feels, Ezgi finds herself in a police station as she continues to question. Could her husband have killed a woman?
